backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and branch‑scoped daily totals with strict authorization and per‑user isolation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping print‑flow and daily‑total behaviors to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend calculator, catalog, auth, and balance sheet files.
frontend/index.css: Global styling and OKLCH‑based theming with light/dark modes and print‑optimized CSS rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the React app with the updated product title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell handling branch authentication gating, view switching, print mode routing, and startup error handling.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that captures render failures and external startup errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Renders the authentication landing page with branch login and optional Internet Identity login, plus app branding and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Provides a controlled form for branch username/password login with validation, error handling, and submit-state control.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Shows the active branch session and provides a logout button when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with detailed error handling, UI states, and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: UI for fatal errors showing an alert, error message, and reload button.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Top notice bar warning about draft links with a copy‑URL button and status feedback.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Displays daily revenue totals and item quantities, with UI to clear all stored data and feedback for success or errors.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Custom hook that loads available days and daily totals from backend or localStorage, syncing with branch changes and storage events.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: Utility functions for managing branch-scoped daily ledgers and summaries in localStorage, including load, save, clear, and summary computation.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Creates a uniquely formatted bill code using timestamp and random suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines the CatalogItem interface and a predefined list of food items with prices and categories.
Utility functions for formatting currency and numbers in INR style.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Provides helpers for matching catalog items to line items and computing added quantities.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: React component for browsing, searching, grouping, and managing catalog items, including adding items to the bill and handling item images.
Defines props for the PredefinedItemCatalog component, including item lists and callbacks for item actions.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Generates a printable bill layout showing line items, totals, taxes, discounts, and a receipt header/footer.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing bill records in branch-scoped localStorage.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page managing line items, catalog interactions, totals, bill saving, and printing.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Defines core types for line items, calculator state, and total breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Utility functions for parsing numbers, clamping values, and calculating line totals and bill breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Converts an image File into a data URL using FileReader, validating type and handling errors.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/branc: Defines fixed print-location logic for specific branches and helpers to enforce or retrieve those fixed addresses.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: UI page for configuring default bill settings including receipt style, payment scan image, and print location with branch-based restrictions.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Loads and saves bill format defaults in branch-scoped localStorage, enforcing fixed branch print addresses and providing fallbacks.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines available receipt styles and the default style for bill printing.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook that loads, updates, and saves bill default settings locally and syncs print location to backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: Syncs bill print location from backend profile into branch-scoped local defaults unless the branch has a fixed address.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Loads a saved bill by ID for rendering and printing, applying receipt style and auto-print behavior with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: Implements simple branch-based login, storing user selection in localStorage and migrating data per branch.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Provides a helper to copy the current page URL to the clipboard with status feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for user profiles, daily totals, balance sheets, and related mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupFailureHand: Hook that listens for unhandled errors and promise rejections during startup and stores the first encountered error message.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, dark mode values, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts the React tree with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/branchScopedStorage.t: Utilities for generating and managing branch-scoped localStorage keys, including migration from legacy global keys.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Simple wrappers around window.confirm for delete and clear-all confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Shim that sets a safe default Internet Identity provider URL using Vite env vars or a production fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, radii, and plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, including a regression issue related to the Print Bill action and feature requests to restore previous print behavior while keeping side effects intact.
